alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 11:48AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Wintery Weather and Cold Temperatures This Weekend... A strong and unseasonably cold storm system will continue to affect the region this weekend. Snow and rain showers will affect much of the area today, but will diminish from west to east during the afternoon and early evening. The heaviest snow showers will briefly bring visibility of less than a mile. Most locations won`t see anything more than a brief slushy dusting of snow. However, elevations above 2500 feet could see an inch or two of accumulation today. This includes Black Mountain and the crest of Pine Mountain. Skies will clear tonight and set us up for temperatures near or below freezing by dawn on Sunday. Most places can expect frost at a minimum. The coldest valleys could have temperatures dipping below 30 degrees.
